name: witch (itch) (pomeroyb)
description:
A short demo made for Ludum Dare 45!

WASD to move, spacebar to (try to) open doors, LMB to possess creatures, and P to exorcise yourself

This was created by Brittany and Brandon, using the Unity Game Engine and the excellent TopDown engine from MoreMountains. The background tileset and sound effects are courtesy of the TopDown Engine.
